website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable and roomy running shoe that's also fashionable enough for casual street wear. Users loved the great fit and support.
pros: Injection molded EVA midsole for lightweight cushioning
cons: Slippery on wet or icy surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Stylish at a low price.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe in person , it’s like a bright white. The toe box is large and very comfortable. Note: this is stylish wearable shoe, don’t attempt crossfit or any real running. It’s looks sick with jeans , joggers or just in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Perez

customer_reviews.title: Peep These Fresh Jays
customer_reviews.text: Nice wide fit for people who like that extra toe room. Very comfortable on the foot, and fit exactly as expected. I'll report back after I try them out at the gym. They walk really smooth too, but are incredibly slippery on ice. The black is black, but the material may give them a slight tinge of purple if the light hits then right.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler_Salami

customer_reviews.title: These shoes have been worn
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe but upon closer inspection the box was definitely opened, I bought a pair of the same shoe directly from Amazon and it looked fine this shoe though looks like it's literally been worn around.. the bottoms are all dirty and the glue is worn badly all along the front seal under the toes and the stuffing was taken out of the inside to keep the shoes shape... I swear someone has been wearing these lol buy directly from Amazon if you dont want to deal with this, this is the 3rd time this has happened to me buying shoes that weren't directly from Amazon or adidas
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, especially for the price. I ordered size 9 as I usually order for shoes but they where small, so I will be ordering a 1/2 size up
customer_reviews.author: Diego Carrere

customer_reviews.title: adidas is my first pick and the best performer for my amateur running
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, adidas and I go back several decades, including getting free shoes in the early days of competitive running. Since than, I have used Saucony, Reebok, and New Balance, but all of the shoes that I paid for and not given to me, adidas is my first pick and the best performer for my amateur running, and trophies still (now infrequently) come my way periodically. My summary of this shoe: adidas is the best at what they do. Good value and high quality are a winner in my running life. This new unitized upper design has really changed the game for runners. They are stable and comfortable, stylish and well made.
customer_reviews.author: JayDub

customer_reviews.title: great product and price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price I would only like to add that the description said white/white/black which tells me the soul should’ve been black. it came white as the picture showed but the verbiage was again white white black please fix that for future customers
customer_reviews.author: Erika Scott

customer_reviews.title: Amazon resales now??
customer_reviews.text: I mean the shoes look nice and fit right but I'm slightly annoyed I paid $70 for a $40 shoe?? Not sure when Amazon became like Ebay where people buy stuff on sale just to resale it at full price..
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: My most favorite sheoes I've ever had. Feels like I'm walking on pillows!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Constantino

customer_reviews.title: Half size fit correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit at 13.5. Initially I bought 1 pair, then after I received them and wore them a day I bought 2 more to have for later. Very comfortable and awesome for long walks, don't really know about running as my knees won't let me but for walking they are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anvoots

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He likes it. He saw it at Shoe Palace but was more expensive so I buy it on Amazon as it's usually cheaper. Item came fast and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: PidginB

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes. Will be buying other colors.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoe. Super comfortable. Only reason for not giving it five stars is that I wish it had a conventional tongue. The sewn-in one looks good but it makes putting the shoe on kinda difficult because it has a fairly tight, form-fitting heel also. On the other hand, if you're used to loosely-laced shoes, with a little extra effort you could maybe leave them laced all the time and still get them on. Not my preference though.
customer_reviews.author: H. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great Casual Shoe Not so great for running
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great, fit great and are very comfortable. UPDATE: These shoes are still very comfortable but not very durable, last month a hole formed & has gradually gotten bigger so they lasted from July-January as a casual shoe. I began running in them in January & that is when they began to degrade and the hole formed. I still would recommend these shoes but strictly as a casual shoe not for running even though they feel good during a run they won't last on the streets. My only other issues is that the price of these shoes rocked up about 20-30$+ since I purchased them because I want to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: High Chief

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Western spy squatting
customer_reviews.text: They look great and feel great If you spend a lot of time on your toes. You don't really have to tie them and they are breathable but can also hold warmth In cold. The back end on the shoe is designed really narrow up to the middle so it takes a bit to adjust to. I love that these don't have the new marshmallow looking out soul ? Mid soul? Whatever it's called it looks like trash on a lot of new sneakers. My boy Oscar wouldn't use them marshmallow looking shoes and he loves trash.
customer_reviews.author: dandy boy apples

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but takes some time to break in!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband who wears a true size 10.5 in all brands. They did fit, but we’re more on the snug side. The material is flexible and after a few days of wear he says they are starting to get more roomy, which is expected with any new shoes of this style. The only thing is that around the bottom where the sole of the shoe meets the rubber, you can see where whatever glue or material used to make these spilled over a little. It doesn’t look terrible but is somewhat noticeable. All in all the comfort is on point and that is what matters most.
customer_reviews.author: brittany Combs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes! Well worth the expense. The only caution I have is to go half a size smaller. I wear a size 9 and this shoe is just a bit bigger than I thought. However, they are very flexible and mold very well to my wide feet :) They are also very light and awesome for the gym and for running!
customer_reviews.author: Jason M Erickson

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit snug
customer_reviews.text: Love how it looks, bought the white knit version. It has no tongue, only a hole to try fit your foot through. The hole doesn't really stretch, the shoe is a bit tight around the foot, a little uncomfortable. It said 10 1/2 but felt like a 10 around the top of the foot from ankle to above the toe. Can be great for keeping the shoe on but, I'd probably go a size up if I was you.
customer_reviews.author: Wondrrboy

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and no need to tie them!
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty hard to get on, and fit looser than I would like, and don’t have as much cushion as I would like. Other than that I like them a lot. They look good and I don’t have to worry about tying or untying my shoes! That’s big for me because I’m lazy. I use them as gym shoes and running shoes and they do the job for both. I expect them to last me 6-9 months hopefully!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Adidas is all over the place
customer_reviews.text: I have this exact same shoe in blue. I liked them so much, I ordered the dark green version in the exact same size. The green pair fit differently, probably a half size bigger. This is a recurring problem with Adidas. I must own 15 pairs. I might wear a 10 in one pair, then a 10.5 in another, and then sometimes an 11. Some fit narrow; others are perfect in the width. There seems to be no uniform fit within the Adidas family of sneakers. It is very frustrating to order Adidas online because you are in serious risk of having to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: christopher wilson

customer_reviews.title: Adidas has another winner!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value for a knit like material. By no means is this Adidas Boost or Bounce cushioning but the Ortholite inserts are good for casual wear, walking, or light jogging.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cool design.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome shoes. A bit different form the Nike flynits. Cool subtle design. Good to have both theses and nikes in the closet. Note - these do not have a tongue so a bit more difficult to get on. This adds to a better fit though.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Not a good shoe for people with high arches
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like how the bottom sole flares out. I didn’t like that the box in the package was demolished and needed an elastic to keep it closed. It looked like everything possible was done during the delivery to destroy the box. I would not recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Cicero

customer_reviews.title: Heels are sloped laterally inward.
customer_reviews.text: If you look at the picture showing the heel of the shoe, you will notice that it looks like the heel slopes inward. That's not an optical illusion. The shoe must have been designed for people with severe overpronation (feet tilting inward - google it). People with a neutral gate may eventually sustain foot injuries from this shoe. So be aware of of this before buying.
customer_reviews.author: avk

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son - they fit well and he liked them. My problem was they arrived 10/16/18 and by 12/10/18 they already had two holes! One hole was by the big toe and the other shoe had a hole where the shoe bends. I paid $86 buck and shoes should last at least two months!
customer_reviews.author: Mom in CA

customer_reviews.title: it seems like they should hold up better under normal conditions
customer_reviews.text: The decorative stitching on the top of the toe has come undone and is starting to become a hole. I purchased two pairs of these, the grey and the sand color and both have the same issue on the stitching. I don’t do anything out of the ordinary in these shoes, just wear them out and about, it seems like they should hold up better under normal conditions. On a positive note, the soles are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, it is European 42 for men and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits great,it is European 42 for men and it fits my 41 perfectly(I'm a woman) great quality ,quite light and red is very attractive. I bought them for gym and they were perfect with no sore feet even for the first wear. Would happily recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tamuna Dvali

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, but the loop on the laces broke about my fifth time wearing them and now I can't tie my shoes. Since I bought them 6 month's ago, I'm probably not going to be able to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. They fit well and are comfortable. One thing I didn't catch when I was buying them is that there is no tongue really, so it's more like putting on a sock. I like it, but an FYI for anyone who may not. They don't get hot, breath really well and keep my feet happy, as I walk a lot, that's a great thing
customer_reviews.author: explainer guy

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for everyday use and have had them for about 6 months now. They have held up perfectly and look almost as if they are new. They provide great support but the only downfall to them is that it took about a week, and a couple of blisters, to break them in. Otherwise they are a great pair of shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dolmanet

customer_reviews.title: Dope shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These look great and they're super comfortable. I get a lot of compliments on them, and I think I'm starting to slowly shift from a nike fan to an adidas fan. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: It’s like getting shoes straight from adidas only way faster and ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my shoes way faster than expected. These originally weren’t available amazon prime and said they would take about a week to get. I ended up getting them in 2-3 days anyway! They come in a brand new Adidas shoe box with tags and all. It’s like getting shoes straight from adidas only way faster and cheaper. I am very pleased. I am a women’s size 8.5 and a perfect size for me was a 7.5. So I’d get 1 size smaller than you usually would.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!... Seeing the price prompted me to write this. I purchased these shoes about 9mo ago. I bought them for $80, as of 4/16/2020 these shoes are $179. That is robbery!.. As much as I love these, people they are NOT worth THAT price!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality. Don't believe it is really Adidas
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe that this is really Adidas product. It lasted for only 4 months until my toe went through it as you can see on the picture. I saw first stitches breaking in already couple of weeks. I have used these shoes for street walking only! This is huge disappointment. I am not buying Adidas anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Pasadena

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but for $90 its made from a cheap material!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this shoes about 4 months ago (in September) and it is really the most comfortable shoe I ever wear for running. I ran mostly on the treadmill (4-5 times a week) BUT still there is no way I should have a hole on the top (see picture). I'm just very disappointed that spending almost $100 this shoe was only good for 4-5 months. I guess i have to go back to running in NIKE.
customer_reviews.author: Zsolt Boka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect All white sneaks!
customer_reviews.text: First off, if you're looking for this type of adidas sneaks in all white, then these are your sneaks. I don't know why they have white/white/black listed as these re all white and exactly what I wanted. Perfect fir. Goes great with my moto jeans or athletic pants.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great shoes, have had fun running and such in them. Really great price for a goodlooking and well performing shoe. Obviously there are cooler ones, but this shoe is great for it’s price and is comfortable and performs well. I also like that the back of the shoe isn’t hard, so I can just slip it on without re-tieing it sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great value!  Give them time to break in
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Very comfortable and what a great price. I wear them to the gym and out casually. They hold up very well to the washing machine and even a quick trip in the dryer to clean them up. Thinking about getting a second pair. The only issue I had was that they were difficult to get on out of the box, but give them time to break in and they are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: JPA

customer_reviews.title: that is the best to compare and guess
customer_reviews.text: my daily shoes. light and comfy. FYI: the size is as normal as ADIDAS shoes do. Do not compare and assume the size is as same as your Nike or other brands of shoes. If you have an athletic Adidas, that is the best to compare and guess. If you have Gazelle or Superstar like a fashion Adidas sneakers... still good to guess but a little chance of bearing 1/2 bigger or smaller than yours.
customer_reviews.author: KH Cho

customer_reviews.title: Nice white sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought matching sneakers for my son and husband. I got a size 7 for my toddler son even though he's just a 5.5 in shoes. He is able to use them anyway because of the sock type fit around the ankle. No worries about the shoe falling off, but the laces do untie easily. I find that is the case with all these thin round laces on all the new style running sneakers, all brands.
customer_reviews.author: DTribeofFive

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: The insole of these sneaks have a weird angle pushing down from outside to inside creating pressure on the ankle. Strange fit for suer. Never had an issue with Adidas before.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: looks great but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Ive worn these shoes for less than one month . they are comfortable for walking around and look great. Don t try running in these shoes and after the first 3 wks the shoe string holder pulls loose so I cant even lace them up properly. disappointed with the performance of these shoes even though they are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Snug sock-type sneaker but with great support
customer_reviews.text: Surprised (pleasantly) by how much support I'm getting from these comfy, good looking shoes. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Glow

customer_reviews.title: Press BUY !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: U can't go wrong with these the look the fit ll perfect u can wear them to the gym or rock them with some good denim super clean look Def not a rainy day kick tho lol
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wright

customer_reviews.title: Can’t even get in the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty design and fashionable sneakers. But these shoes come with closed and slightly elastic openings - suppose to fit like gloves. The problem is that the opening is so small and tight that I couldn’t get my left foot in the shoe, at all. Then what good does it do?
customer_reviews.author: ThunderClaps

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is super stylish , I got the white pair and I almost don’t even want to wear them outside lol. I don’t use them for running, or physical activity, I just wear them casually with skinny jeans cuffed on the bottom. I get a lot of compliments from both genders and I’m very happy I made the purchase. I’m usually a jeans and vans guy and still am 60% of the time but these shoes are a great change up.
customer_reviews.author: Augie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad to say.  Looks good, feels good.
customer_reviews.text: I got these at a good price. They look great, are comfortable, and very versatile. I put some shoe protector spray on them and they've held up very nicely. Great purchase for an active dad on the weekend who wants a little style in his athleisure wear look!
customer_reviews.author: WayBack Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect running shoes but the design is kinda wack
customer_reviews.text: very comfy and perfect fir for me. But after looking at the designs in person, it just looks ugly. Ill still wear it but I should have bought the original Adidas shoe design with the 3 stripes.
customer_reviews.author: SushicCat55

customer_reviews.title: I love adidas originals it's the very beyond best brand in the whole entire world
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so very much they are really very awesome and comfortable to wear I love adidas originals it's my way very super beyond most absolutely favorite brand in the whole entire world
customer_reviews.author: Aiden Drake Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes, but was ultimately disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First time buying adidas since junior high (been sticking with Nike) - chose to just mix it up with these. Stylish shoe, but is not comfortable for a long period of time (8+ hours), whereas I felt like I could wear my Nike Free RN shoes all day. Also the little black stripes on the top are thread and not done well, mine started unravelling after about 3 weeks, not super noticeable yet, but probably will go back to Nike's or try something else after this shoe wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice looking but no support or comfort
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these shoes but there is no support and if i walk long distance in them the balls of your feet get sore. Good for fashion not exercising
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of shoes for a good price...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes arrived quickly and were a reasonable price. The fit was right on. My son loved them and they've held up great. He's been wearing them since August 2019.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Cassini

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Adidas
customer_reviews.text: My kids bought these for their dad for Father’s Day. He said they are really comfortable and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: 2boysandthatsit

customer_reviews.title: Worse she’s ever.
customer_reviews.text: Worse shoes we ever purchased, the cuffs are too small for the feet to go in.
customer_reviews.author: ying

customer_reviews.title: Laces suck
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes, but the part that holds the laces in place is as strong as a month old squirrel. If you pull them too hard they will break. Be careful if you do decide to buy them, which I would recommend you do not. I would find a way to tuck the laces so that you never have to tie them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Borzilleri

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but...Impossible to get on
customer_reviews.text: The 'tongue' is actually sewn in and even though I never have a problem with high arches meant that it was actually impossible to get this shoe on my foot; the cuff or boot opening is just too small.
customer_reviews.author: McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Great price
customer_reviews.text: My husbands favorite shoes for work...we actually purchased some from Champs then returned them when we saw a better price here. I’m sure we’ll order more cause he goes through these like crazy
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Winning
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable! I’m an adidas fan and buy the brand often. These are among my favorite. The only thing is that they’re the sock fit kind and are kinda hard to put on. But once they’re on, they’re on! And amazing! Had I known they were the sock fit kind, I wouldn’t have gotten them. But I’m super glad I did. Winning for walking distances.
customer_reviews.author: Quancheese

customer_reviews.title: Great Red Athletic Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and attractive. Red athletic shoes are tough to fit...really love them!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne D

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my hubby because he loves the blues ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby because he loves the blues ones he has. Except these run alittle bigger than the blue ones, not sure why (same style and same size)
customer_reviews.author: Leila Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but wider at the ball of food than heal
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable show. It’s a bit wider at the ball of the foot than the heal which makes them a little loose. Otherwise very comfortable and well constructed
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Cline

customer_reviews.title: Such a great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been an adidas fan, but these may be the most comfortable, form fitting, pair of shoes I have ever had in all my days! My feet love them!
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight
customer_reviews.text: These shoes aren't bad, but they aren't exactly a good fit. They are more like slips on but it's so hard to get them on and then they just suffocate my feet. I had to return them
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S

customer_reviews.title: Not Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sneakers April 2nd 2019 & the front of my sneakers already have a huge hole in them . I’ve never had this issue with any sneakers before . This is very disappointing considering they’re so comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: Lgatling

customer_reviews.title: Design weakness
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shoes for my son. After 3 months, the string eyelets at the top of the shoe began to break. He was able to survive with the tops giving way but after the second series broke, the shoes we’re unusable. 80 dollars for three months; that’s not much value. Otherwise the shoes fit and performed well. That’s worth 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: B. Burt

customer_reviews.title: Classic but updated Adidas styling  in a breathable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the classic Adidas look in this casual type, modern sneaker design. I also like the slightly wider toe box since this is one of the main reasons that steered me toward other brands in the recent past. One thing I'm not completely wild about is the tongue which is completely stitched; this makes it a little harder to get the shoe on without using a shoe horn. Overall I'm tickled that I can now go back to my traditional and favored Adidas brand.
customer_reviews.author: rbrown0566

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It fits excellent, feels very comfortable, and light weight, but the major problem is the lubes to hold the shoe lace breaks easily, I have it for two months now I can't wear it .
customer_reviews.author: Khaled Attili

customer_reviews.title: Deep Army green, not any sort of tan.
customer_reviews.text: I love how they fit, so I’m gonna keep them. But my real concern is that they are a heavy army green, instead of this greenish tan in the photo. It was totally a letdown.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob D.

customer_reviews.title: Great addiads quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a reliable and comfortable shoe. I use it for the gymn, walking, and going to class. Really versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! Great looking and there’s a jacket available that we bought that matched the shoe. Looks awesome together
customer_reviews.author: monique robbins

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, don't sleep on these.
customer_reviews.text: Saw these on a sneaker website so I grabbed a pair of blacked out ones. Really nice fit and comfy to walk long distances in.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have worne Nike for 18 years now and just made the switch this year they're definitely a far superior product more comfortable and your feet won't get as hot as they otherwise would with the Nike shoe I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Thor Omundson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First of all... they are thrown in an amazon box, NOT an adidas box with NO tags on the shoe. They have marks on the side of one shoe, and a pull on the lace of the other shoe. These were supposed to be given as a gift, I’m returning.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and elegant, they are one of my favorites, fast and hassle-free delivery, I will continue to choose adidas items, they are the best
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM_APD

customer_reviews.title: They look great, and feel amazing
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are awesome they look great and they are litterally so comfortable. so comfortable i actually bought my mom the all black pair, my mom has mild plantarfasciaitis but she loves the all black pair because she has a job where she has to stand alot but she no longer gets flare ups while using them.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos V.

customer_reviews.title: People be jelly bad
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes Ive bought in quite a few years. If you dont mind working a lil to keep them stunning. People be jelly bad and they only $60.
customer_reviews.author: FleekNerd

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable for walking through NYC
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable for walking through NYC! I use these more for casual then running. Worth buying. I’m only giving them 4 stars because the laces don’t have holes they’re looped through a string but it holds up for casual use.
customer_reviews.author: frank capozzoli

customer_reviews.title: Recipient impressed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a Christmas gift. Recipient put them on as soon as he opened them and could not stop raving about how good they felt and this is now what he wears when not at work.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe, the sole took a little adjustment, I primarily wear Nike so this sole is different and the upper primeknit is sturdy and light at the same time. This shoe is either for you or it’s not. Color is spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Sheli L. Goode-brown

customer_reviews.title: Not a good running sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: They are not good for running. First day the balls of my feet started to hurt. Not enough coushin for running. I would just use them for walking briefly.
customer_reviews.author: Valentin Astorga

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I use them for daily exercise on my elliptical and with weights. I also have an extra pair in blue. The fit is awesome. You don’t feel them.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Bermejo

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love them😍 Super comfy 👌🏼 I really recommend this model. The only think i recomend go 1/2 size bigger. I wear 9.5,i order size 10 and fits me perfect. I check reviews before ordering mine and definitely most people is right about the size reviews. Don’t hesitate to order a pair for you. You will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: My brother loved them! Sooo comfortable! I own two pairs myself! The color is exactly as pictured and worth the money! Shipping was phenomenal as well!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son bought me a pair for Christmas and I love them so much I had to get a pair for my boyfriend. He LOVES them, he said it's like walking on air!
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: To large
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes they fit a little large I had to go down half a size. My one thing I do not like is that they do not separate at show and tongue. This means you have to squeeze your foot in them. They are a tad tight for a while and they pushed in on my leg for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loosely attached material?
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit and are comfortable, however the stripes started detaching (see photos) in less than a month of use with very moderate and minimal wear and tear. Subpar materials and surprising to see from Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Minimal
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable, once I could get them on. With their unique opening and no tongue, they are difficult to squeeze on. I do appreciate the minimal styling.
customer_reviews.author: andrew_wsomething

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. All of the other brands I use can’t quite fit like adidas. I usually gotta use a size bigger so the width would fit as well. But for shoes like these they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Super cool, comfy-my son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My son was thrilled to receive these-super trendy and much cheaper than we saw at local shops!
customer_reviews.author: Jlrvs69

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, black color a little off
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, very comfortable,fits perfect and seems durable only thing is the black color looked slightly burnt out in the light...bought a blue one also which looked perfect though.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pair. One for husband he loved them and one for grandson. But his did not fit. He wears a 8 and we purchased an 8 I don’t know what happened. But my husbands fit and he loved them
customer_reviews.author: Golly e

customer_reviews.title: Don't get these if you wakk around throughout the day ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't get these if you wakk around throughout the day. Your feet will just slide around. I definitely bought the right size. The problem us the sole is slippery and they're too wide. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Broughton

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my husband. They are a good combination with jeans during summer. The color is like on the picture and they are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: AVA

customer_reviews.title: Dedicated  to these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes I bought like 3 pairs of these type of shoes and I swear I’d buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brittmakesyourhairgorgeous

customer_reviews.title: Sole inside the shoe is an issue
customer_reviews.text: Comfort seems to be fine..although, the inner sole of the shoe is a huge problem. Assuming that the shoes were clearly made for running, I expected the sole to be hard and not moving!
customer_reviews.author: Syavasya Nikhil

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE. Got them as a gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE. Got them as a gift for my boyfriend & he loves them. He says they are very comfortable, he also wears them to the gym. Overall they’re a bit darker blue than they look on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Reghan

customer_reviews.title: I love the foam platform
customer_reviews.text: I love the foam platform. This is my third pair. Still breaking them in. However initially not as comfortable as my racers.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: 1st Adidas not going to be last!
customer_reviews.text: The outsole in the heel area has more cushion than I would like but other than that I really like my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got similar style from Nerdstrom that were much more comfortable for about same price
customer_reviews.author: Blake3456

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. They're brand new as I write this, but I expect they'll feel even better after I wear em in.
customer_reviews.author: D J MCCURDY

customer_reviews.title: weak materials
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, my son wore them this week for his PE class and he came back telling me that the shoes strips were getting ruined on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Gabuardi

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes ever. Sleek design. Wore them all day at Disney World and felt great. Fits as expected
customer_reviews.author: Katharyn M Mudd

product_meta.title: adidas Originals Men's Swift Running Shoe
product_meta.description: The Swift distills elements from '80s running designs and adds a modern feel. These knit shoes are covered with a striking camouflage graphic and are finished with smooth welded details. They come with a supportive, sock-like feel and are built for all-day ease with a cushy midsole.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately mid-top" from arch
